package.name: AW_Blog
package.summary: Blog for magento. Shows posts with comments. Comments can be auto approved or moderated by admin. Categories. Plus much more.
package.description: The Blog extension for Magento is reckoned among the best buzz and word of mouth marketing tips. It not only provides your regular customers with up-to-date information but brings additional visitors to your site, builds relevant SEO-friendly text links, and serves as assistance in building sales strategy.
package.notes:
Changelog:
+ Ability to duplicate posts + Comments per page option
* Magento CE 1.3.3.0 - incorrect CSS for comment form * Incorrect module disabling at the system settings * Short content is not displayed if it contains only image * Incorrect parsing of tags with special symbols * IE 9 - incorrect form validation * Tags from disabled posts are visible at the frontend * Error 404 on changing store view language * Paragraph breaks are ignored in comments * Duplicate tags for one post are visible
